titles.title: A joint resolution designating "God Bless America" as the national hymn of the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/23/1988--Introduced. Designates the composition known as "God Bless America" as the national hymn of the United States. Declares that this designation shall not be construed to repeal or affect the Act designating the Star-Spangled Banner as the national anthem.
